```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r}
library(quizlite)
```

```{r}
quizlite_knit(question(text = "What is better?",
                  answer("R", correct = TRUE),
                  answer("Python"),
                  answer("Javascript"),
                  answer("S")),
              question(text = "Who is awesome?",
                  answer("I am", correct = TRUE),
                  answer("Not me")))
```
